dialogue: No one is dying Kaki. Come... let me take you back.
Don't you’ll have somewhere to be?
R U gng 2 pick me up 2day?
Are you hiding them under your tongue?
Good.
Prabha, I am going. Do yo need anything?
No...... you go ahead. I’ll see you at home.
uh huh!
You left so early...what happened?
Nothing happened... I went all the way to pay the electricity bill and just as my turn came, the lady closed the counter! To top that, it started pouring!!
Oh I didn’t know they had the office open so late!
I will try another day...
She is getting so big!
I found her loitering in the corridor outside Kulkarni’s flat
I asked Doctor Manoj if he will have a look at her...
What did he say? We shouldn’t bother him with such things.
Don’t worry, he will do it...he is a nice guy.
I don’t know Aunty.
What is it?
Is it from your mother?
Prabha, it is for you!
Eh? For me?
Smt. Prabha Ponappa. You are right... Who sent it?
Doesn’t say...
It is beautiful, isn’t it?
I am sure whatever we make in this will be very good.
We used to have a rice cooker at home... but not like this...this one is really international. Looks expensive, no?
Who would have sent this?
Sorry...There is nothing written.
D-I-c-h-t-u-n-g....the label is some foreign language.
Prabha! Doesn’t your husband live there?
Maybe your husband got a bonus or something... that is why he has sent it...?
Or maybe he misses you! It is quite romantic-
There must be some mistake
We should not use it...
Don’t mind her doctor, she talks more than she should.
Why did you have to talk like that?
Talk like what?
The way you did! To doctor Manoj... you can’t do that! You can’t do whatever you want! If you behave like a slut, people will never give you any respect! Everyone is talking about you!
She is getting on my nerves.
I will find a burqa... don't worry...
Anu... Are you hungry?
I..I.. prepared your favourite dish...
Coconut fish curry.
Listen... I don’t know what came over me today... I don’t know why I said all that. I... I am sorry Anu...
It is very good...
Prabha? Did you know him from before?
Who?
Your husband?
No. Not at all. One day my father called me and said, come home. When I got there, they had already fixed my marriage. That’s the way it went.
You didn’t try to find out about him?
I did. I tried to meet him.
It must have been romantic!
No. Not romantic. I got scared and did not end up going.
Did you find him handsome?
I thought he was... Good looking.
Prabha, are you asleep?
No.
Can I ask you something else?
Go on...
How can you marry a stranger? I don’t think I could do it.
You might think you know someone but they can also become strangers...
How is that?
They can go away and come back as different people maybe... Or simply change over time. And then they are as good as strangers. No?
Anu are you asleep?
Yes, but you can go on...

After the marriage...he left soon... to Germany. Once he was gone, I hardly heard from him again. We spoke a few times... But it became difficult, to talk. Maybe we didn’t have anything left to say any more.
Do you miss him?
I don’t know. Can you miss someone you don’t even know?
I try to imagine his life in this far away country. Everything must be different there. I think of him in this large warehouse. It all seems so faraway.
I can’t
Its easy!
I don’t know how to lie.
I will start...Number 1 - When I was 15, I won the Miss Ernakulam Contest. Number 2- I have seen Mammootty with my own eyes.
And number 3.... I ran away from home once because my mother wanted me to cut my hair!
You saw Mammootty? That is a lie. How would you see a big star like him?
You lose. I saw him!
I did participate in the Miss Ernakulam Contest...but I lost. I didn't even make it through the first round!
It can happen...that the judges have bad taste.
My mother said the same thing! Your turn.
No no... You go again.
One sided game?
Please?
Ok... uh... Number 1, I always wanted to be a nurse. Since I was a small kid. Its all I ever dreamt of.
Number two?
Umm... Two... My parents once forgot me at a temple. Maybe because I was always so quiet...
Number three?
Umm...... Uh... Number 3, my husband invited me to come to stay with him.
To Germany?
Oh... thats great..! You didn't tell me that you called him.
So which statement is a lie? The second one?
Yea... sure.
Prabha... Can I tell you something? My parents are also looking for a guy...for me to marry.
But I don’t want to.
Why don’t you talk to them?
As if it is possible to speak to my father.
What will you do?
I don’t know what to do. Maybe run away...?
You can’t escape your fate...by running away.
I am very tired... I want to rest for a bit.
I’m very tired.
Let her be...She did carry the big bag.
I could take a long nap after this meal !
I think we should leave then...it will become late.
